snippet: The United Automobile Workers union on Saturday set a deadline of Sunday night for General Motors to agree to a new four-year contract, raising the prospect of a strike at G.M.’s American operations.
abstract: United Automobile Workers union sets deadline for General Motors to agree on new four-year contract; move hints that strike could happen if deal is not made.
lead_paragraph: The United Automobile Workers union on Saturday set a deadline of Sunday night for General Motors to agree to a new four-year contract, raising the prospect of a strike at G.M.’s American operations.

headline.print_headline: Auto Union Gives G.M. Sunday Deadline
headline.main: Auto Union Gives G.M. Sunday Deadline
